REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2212 reute r f BC-RECENT-SECURITIES-OFF 04-09 0078

TEXT.TITLE: RECENT SECURITIES OFFERINGS FILED WITH SEC
TEXT.BODY: The following proposed public offerings of securities were filed recently with the Securities and Exchange Commission: Utah Power and Light Co <UTP> - Shelf offering of up to 95 mln dlrs of first mortgage bonds on terms to be set at the time of sale. Underwriters were not named. Conseco Inc <CNC> - Two mln shares of common stock through an underwriting group led by Dean Witter Reynolds Inc. Reuter
